translations: n.[机]扩散器（diffuser 的复数形式）；柔光镜

phrs.translation: 叶片扩压器；叶片式扩散器

sentences.sentence: You can also purchase aromatherapy diffusers.
sentences.translation: 您也可以购买香薰扩散器。

sentences.sentence: Cast iron diffusers with pinned stainless steel vanes.
sentences.translation: 铸造的扩压器并镶有不锈钢叶片。

sentences.sentence: Three months ago he should have come to us to tell us there are two interpretations over the diffusers .
sentences.translation: 三个月前，他应该来找我们，告诉我们有两种以上解释的扩散。
